website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a lightweight product able to handle your professional workload, this lap desk is an excellent choice.
pros: Substantial room for laptops of various sizes
Includes precision tracking mousepad and a spacious cell phone holder
Customers rave over the product's comfortable pillow cushions
cons: Mouse pad could use a border to keep mouse from sliding

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: It is a good concept, but needs work in my opinion. It is light weight and has plenty of room. I like the separate area for the mouse and holder for your phone. However, they do not work as designed; 1. It leans too far forward, due to the different sized pads underneath. 2. The mouse pad area needs some type of raised bumper or border, as the mouse is constantly sliding off the desk and falling every time I move. 3. The phone holder is not deep enough, so the phone is constantly falling out or over, and not wide enough to put your phone in sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Lacrashdog

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was better
customer_reviews.text: I work in my car and the size is great. The built in mouse pad is a definite plus and I love the slot to hold my phone. Functionally it's great, except that the plastic that surrounds the mouse pad is lifting where my wrist sits. It's very uncomfortable and it's causing a bulge in the center where the mouse is and makes the movement of the mouse difficult. I'm going to try and fix it myself because I don't want to have to spend more money on another one when I've only had this one a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B.

customer_reviews.title: close to being idea, but......
customer_reviews.text: this is so close to being ideal.... the mouse pad works, the desk itself is rather light, it contains my HP laptop with ease, the notch holds my cellphone or a pen or whatever. that said, the surface is a bit slick.... and the laptop and mouse can get a bit rocky-rocky if the laptop desk is not level or close to it. The material that the laptop rests on is textured, but not enough to grip the laptop. Mine has a small edge piece at the bottom, which keeps the laptop from flying off the edge, but not enough to mitigate the slipping about of both the mouse and the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amor

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this lap desk is lightweight. Kind of like cardboard weight. Which is about how easily it bends and folds in half at the weak spot, along the edge of the mouse pad. I wouldn't suggest purchasing this. Mine only lasted three days/one use before breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ann Kelly

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE. YOU WILL BE DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lap desk (had one before that lasted me a year), same brand and everything. The first time i purchased it from Office Depot. No problem. I purchased from this seller and the first WEEK I had it, the right part where the mouse goes broke and bends now everytime I lay anything on it, even my mouse! CHEAPLY built. If I hadn't gone out of town for 3 weeks, I would have returned it instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Ni

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop desk
customer_reviews.text: Son received for Christmas and he approves. There is a slight grab feel to the top where the 15" laptop sits along with a small bumper to catch it if needed. Son said the mouse pad is pretty slick and if not completely flat, the mouse tends to slide off. However he said it wasn't a huge deal because if he was using the lap desk, then he was using the mouse for whatever game and his hand never leaves the mouse. The little opening for the cell phone is perfect so when mom calls, son can see that mom is calling!! Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: slrincv

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT item!! HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how comfortable this lap desk is!! I usually sit 'yoga' style, and it works great. If I sit in the chair 'normal', it works great. If I sit with my legs sideways, it works great. I was worried it would be leaning to the left because of the heavy laptop, but somehow it distributes the weight evenly. The quality is amazing. And the little tray above the mouse for a cell phone? Genius! I highly recommend this item and am going to tell everyone I know that has a laptop about it. Makes life so much easier and more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Gal

customer_reviews.title: I like this lap desk a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this lap desk a lot, but now after months of having it, the bean bag cushions on the bottom are dying on me, which is causing comfort issues. The mousepad is great and is plenty of space for me when gaming. It fits my 17" Asus laptop well, but it has back vents and they don't seem to get the best airflow on this.
customer_reviews.author: KattZombiee

customer_reviews.title: Great for working at home while lounging.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lap desk for my wife as she works from home quite a bit and likes to watch TV in bed while working. This allows her to do what she likes best! I have used it a couple of times and found that it is not the most comfy when it's on your lap but she generally sets it on the bed. The phone holder works great and little mouse pad could be a tad larger, but it's still very functional. I would recommend this as a cool gift for someone who works at home.
customer_reviews.author: Sh3cky

customer_reviews.title: The perfect lap desk for at home work or lounging around!
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and was looking for something to hold my laptop and allow me to do my work while sitting on the couch or in bed. After looking at the reviews of a ton of different lap desks on Amazon I found this one and decided to give it a try. What a great purchase. It's lightweight but very sturdy and the beanbag pillow supports on the bottom allow you to use your laptop for extended amounts of time without hurting your legs or getting uncomfortable. The mousepad works great and I've gotten more use out of the phone holder than I ever expected. If you're searching for a lapdesk, this is the one to get!
customer_reviews.author: JuniorSenior

customer_reviews.title: Pretty handy
customer_reviews.text: So I really like this lap desk. It's mostly comfortable and really convenient. However, when o pick it up with my laptop on it, it blows from the weight. Makes me a little bit nervous. Also, the mouse area where my wrist goes is pretty uncomfortable. I didn't think I'd need a wrist pad, cause before my mouse was on a couch pillow, but now that my wrist is uncomfortable I can see the merits of having one. Still love it so far. Maybe I can buy a wrist pad separately.
customer_reviews.author: Jobug

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight, good price point
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight, good price point. Perfect size for working from my living room recliner. The phone slot is a nice touch and feels pretty secure. I haven't used the mouse pad much since I'm just using the touch pad on my laptop, but it's nice having some extra space to the side for snacks lol. Maybe not quite big enough for a comfortable gaming session with a larger laptop, like the 17" Asus gaming laptops, but it's very very nice for a 15" Macbook.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Very useful when I'm not at my desk
customer_reviews.text: I have a home office where my laptop sits on a desk most of the time. However, I will sometimes take my laptop with me and sit on the couch or in bed. This Lap Desk is quite useful and comfortable to use. My wireless mouse works well on the built-in mouse pad and I will also put my phone on the little slot at the top. If you have a larger (17") lap top this will be ideal since it is wider than other models. If you have a smaller lap top, you may want a smaller Lap Desk since the bigger one will end up being much wider than needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron K

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Husband got it for me as a gift [Silver one]! It's great! Never gets too hot or anything. The only issue is that my laptop is a 2014 Macbook pro 15" that its just a little thick so sometimes it slides off depending on how much I tilt it (there's a black line stopper). I had a case on my laptop before and it definitely slid off with the case if I barely tilted it forward while sitting. Aside from there it works great! I gave it a 4/5 since my laptop was a bit too big for it, but I recall newer laptops are are much thinner. Also, if not tilted it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works well but design flaw. There's a bar along the bottom to hold the laptop from sliding down if angled.... But the mouse slides off continuously because there's nothing there to prevent that.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Shopper #12345

customer_reviews.title: ... third lap desk purchase because I was never fully satisfied with the others
customer_reviews.text: This is my third lap desk purchase because I was never fully satisfied with the others. I was reluctant to spend the money as this one is significantly more expensive. But it was worth it. This is exactly what I was looking for. It has the built in mousepad which is big enough to use (unlike my last purchase), it has a slot for a smart phone or small device, it has cushions underneath for lap comfort, and is large enough to fit my laptop! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: catch211

customer_reviews.title: great concept, but the bottom pads lose there form
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product however After awhile the beans Underneath wear out. it's kind of like being bags, they wear out after awhile Making the padding useless, If there was a replacement for those beads,or a warranty to replace, that would be great.Otherwise we have to pay $40 again For the same thing to wear out .
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop pad, it's just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I work from home quite a bit and I'm always on the lookout for a good laptop pad. This one is great. It's lightweight but seems well made. The size is perfect and I can use my 14" or 15" laptop easily with room for the mouse. The mouse pad area is like a neoprene nonslip material, which is great and I love the slot for my phone. It also has a nice little handle to hanging up when not in use. Cons: I thought it was a little overpriced but overall it's a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Summers GirlTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a  multitasker
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday. Makes it easy to move your laptop, mouse and cell around wherever you need it. My laptop never leaves it. Very lightweight but strong. Love it...if it ever wears out, I'm getting another one exactly like it!
customer_reviews.author: R.L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Working at Home
customer_reviews.text: Got one originally to see if my husband and I would like it. We work from home or late at night so we were looking for a comfortable and practical lap desk. We love t so much and the fact neither one of us wanted to share that we got another one. It’s compact, light, comfortable and easy to store. The added features (mouse pad area and phone stand) are a HUGE plus! You don’t feel cramped trying to use our mouse, nor do you need to find space next to you for your mouse. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop Desk I've had so far.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 17 inch laptop! I love the built in mouse pad and slot for my phone. There is a small bar at the bottom of the desk that keeps my laptop from sliding off, which I love, but the mouse does slip off the pad from time to time. The width is comfortable for my laptop and the padding on the bottom makes it easy to adjust how it rests on my lap. I always find it difficult to find a good lap desk to fit a 17inch laptop and this one delivers. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Disappearing Padding???
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It has more than an adequate work surface. I like the cell phone slot. Cons: It does not have any area for ventilation, if laptop cooling is an issue. The padding which was adequate on arrival disappeared after 3 months. The cushions are filled with what feels like tiny granules. There is no tear or pinhole in the padding cover. I have never seen any padding contents leaking. All I can say for sure is that after a few months, the padding is nearly non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Gary DyJack

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size. I really like side panel for the mouse. The material of the board is easy to wipe down and the fabric pillow is a very tight weave. Its nice and sturdy. The only thing I would change is the configuration of the pillow. Its not cushy and a little uncomfortable against my legs/knees. That is why I gave it 4 stars. If use it for any length of time I have to put another pillow under it. But that is okay, it is not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Madea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with a stupid old lapdesk that I had to tape with duck tape and that was too small for my 17" laptop forever, and when I was finally done with it, I ordered this gem of a product. I am absolutely pleased with its quality, it is nice and big enough for my laptop, has its own mousepad, and I love the hole for the cell phone (I actually found that it increases the phone`s volume a few times)! I am very very satisfied, and I hope this lapdesk will last me quite a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Nina T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable product that makes things convenient
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mom. She loves it and the main reason I got it for her was because she likes using the mouse more than the pad. Wherever she had the laptop she would use the mouse on her leg or the sofa rest; most of the time it would not work because that's just not how PC mouse are meant to be placed. Flat dark pad, is what I wanted for her and the bean bag cushion on the bottom are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: rony777

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully and is ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time on my laptop because I have an upper body chronic pain condition that makes it difficult to sit at my desktop. I tried other laptop tables, but they too high and I would experience pain in my hands and arms when using it. This is perfect, it sits low enough and I don't strain my hands and arms using my mouse with my laptop. Well worth the price and I can sit my phone above the mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I like to use a mouse with my laptop and was always uncomfortable hunching over the coffee table to use my computer. My husband bought me this as a gift and I just love it. Very comfortable, just the right size for laptop and mouse, and I really like the slot for telephone or credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle Dove

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for on-the-go use
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this to work in the car on our road trip. Worked really well. Only thing that bothered him was the mouse kept falling off the side of the desk. Need a lip on it to prevent things slipping!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hardisty

customer_reviews.title: I love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I usually sit on the couch to do work on my laptop. I bought a new laptop, 17 inch and realized I really wanted a desk to be able to utilize by mouse. Finding one to fit proved to be difficult. This works perfect. My 17.3 inch Asus fits perfects and allows me to use my mouse and have my iphone7+ (in a case) propped up in the little slot. It's comfortable and feels very stable. I'm really really glad I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Renee Thielman

customer_reviews.title: I like it! Pretty sturdy as well as 2 nice ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Pretty sturdy as well as 2 nice padded horizontal strip bags for use on your lap. Nice side area for a mouse as well as a small slot to prop up your cell phone if needed. I does not have any vent cuts for the bottom of the laptop (i use a Mac Notebook), but my laptop has pads that lift it up a bit so it does not get hot (something i was concerned about when ordering)
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B.

customer_reviews.title: Cushioning Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: The cushioning at the bottom is almost flat now. It's not designed so you can replace the Styrofoam cushioning inserts, not that you should have to. Product should last and perform as advertised for more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Overall: Pretty Good, but not Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but it's not perfect. I'm using this in a La-Z-Boy recliner with my legs up, so the angle is a little bit higher than I'd like. The laptop seems to stay fairly well and not slip, but the cell phone holder is super small for any size phone. The phone holder isn't very deep. Overall it works for the size laptop that I am using (13.3") and makes it easier to type while it's in my lap, versus just having a laptop on my lap. Overall for the price, not bad.
customer_reviews.author: SirAegis Games

customer_reviews.title: Good table, needs some reinforcement
customer_reviews.text: Nice laptop table that is comfortable. Mine developed a crack just to the left of the mouse pad area, as there isn't as much material there holding it all together. A tiny revision to that spot and it would be perfect. Cool carbon fiber look is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: corliss1

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for those big laptop computers!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY! A lapdesk that actually fits my laptop (with 17.3" monitor). I've had others that SAY they will but this one actually does. The mouse pad is a bonus! If I have any complaint at all (and certainly not worth removing a star for), it's that I wish the phone slot was either longer, to fit my Samsung S7 phone in landscape) or deeper, to more securely hold my phone in portrait. Considering the phone slot is a bonus and can still be used for other things (as other reviewers have suggested), it does not remove from what I bought the product for at all.
customer_reviews.author: Starla Rocco

customer_reviews.title: If they made one just like this one for left-handed people I would get another ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for myself but since it is really made for right handed people, base on where the mouse pad is, I gave it to my granddaughter to try out. She says she likes it but not sure that is really the case since I haven't seen her use it. If they made one just like this one for left-handed people I would get another one. It was pretty comfortable sitting on my lap and was made very well. I really liked the size and the spot for my cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Valine

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and he loves it. He had picked it out and I was a bit hesitant to be honest but it seems to work great from him. He always sits on the couch to do homework etc. He has a 15.6" screen so he does have a larger laptop and its the perfect size. I've even considered getting one for myself but I have yet to try it out. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: It does not have enough room if you have a ...
customer_reviews.text: It does not have enough room if you have a 17 in lap top. and the pad for the mouse has a plastic edge and it does not have a lot of room to move your mouse around.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: I have wasted so much money on tables
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!! I have wasted so much money on tables, stands, etc and I finally found something thats light, comfy, and has a place for the mouse!! I have an enormous heavy laptop and it fits just right. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a more comfy place to sit at home when paying bills, working, or just having fun on the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: MJensen2018

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but slipprery surface for laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop desk is a good size, not too heavy to sit on your lap, mouse pad area works well, and looks nice. The pads on the bottom are comfortable on your legs. It's just ok because the surface of the desk is slippery and my laptop slides around.
customer_reviews.author: RMAC

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for 14 inch laptop
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for my 14 inch (ca. 36 cm) laptop. I would highly recommend this if you have an adjustable bed so you're able to sit in bed with your laptop. I'm glad I purchased this item over the folding plastic and aluminum items now I have had a change to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Goodman

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this desk for over a year, and I use it every day. It's usually used with my laptop (does not slide) and USB mouse, but I've also written thank you notes and journaled on it. It's slightly too wide for my body, but I'm pretty thin, and I don't mind that it sticks out - I appreciate the extra real estate!
customer_reviews.author: KristaT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product 10/10
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Its the perfect size for my 15.6 laptop, the built in mouse pad is also perfect size. I often play games using the mouse pad and have no issues. What really makes it awesome is the cell phone holder. I have the iPhone x and it fits perfectly inside and props it up so i can see the screen perfectly. Ive already recommended it to two people who have also bought and loved it!! 10/10 product.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzles In The Shizzle

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It has made using my laptop anywhere so easy. It tucks away right next to my laptop because it's slim and the cushions give. The side part for the mouse is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size, comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is great so far, my chunky, 17" display, gaming laptop fits neatly and the mousepad area is a good size. I'm not sure what position other reviewers are sitting in; I haven't had any issues with the laptop leaning forward. The lap cushions are comfortable and I like that there's a gap for air cooling.
customer_reviews.author: T.S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bent
customer_reviews.text: Bent on the first day and now it's a flimsy piece of junk that doesn't work very well at all. I would recommend looking for a product that provides more stiffness and can actually support a lightweight Dell laptop without turning into a U shape surface.
customer_reviews.author: MnM1298

customer_reviews.title: Great for HS student
customer_reviews.text: My son is given a chromebook at school. He loves to sit on the couch and be comforatble while he works. This is the perfect size to fit the chromebook, a mouse, and fits his iphone (with a case on) in the phone slot. Its really comforatble, nice looking, and seems like good quailty.
customer_reviews.author: CallMeKenzi

customer_reviews.title: Bent within seconds of receiving.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very flimsy "luxury" device for $40. I expected something with a plastic top at the very least. This is compacted cardboard at best with some very light vinyl material coating to give it's finished effect. Also to hide the fact that it is cardboard! Also should consider putting a bumper for the mouse portion. Remember, you're working with angles here...
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Great product works very well
customer_reviews.text: Great product works very well. Good size my laptop and mouse fits very well. Only negative is the mouse easily slides off the mouse pad. Would like to have something at bottom to keep mouse on the laptop desk-mouse pad. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Using it right now to type this review. Holds my Macbook Pro 17" well. I love the separate area for mouse use. The cell phone slot is a nice touch, though I don't use it much. The cushions underneath are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jlangston70

customer_reviews.title: Great lap desk.
customer_reviews.text: For large laptops, it basically perfect. My 15" sits with a little margin on either side. The bean-bag pads don't let their material drift much, so they stay nice and fluffy. The body is very strong and light. So there's relatively little twisting or bending when grabbing or lifting from one edge. The mouse pad lip doesn't get uncomfortable during long use. The only downside, consequently, is the lip is very low, and the mouse will run away if tilted and left unhanded.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Shareno

customer_reviews.title: Carry it with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to use So glad I spent the money for this lap desk. Everything right at my fingertips. Things stay put they only move if you want them to. Easy to store to. I like the handle to carry it with. Plenty of room for coloring for my granddaughter when she comes to hang out with me.
customer_reviews.author: psathey

customer_reviews.title: Decent... until it snapped in half after a month
customer_reviews.text: The mouse pad on the side is a good size, the desk was comfortable to use. Then I picked it up off my table with my laptop on it and the desk snapped in half right between the mousepad and the desk surface. I only used it for about a month and it appears to be made out of very cheap particle board or possibly cardboard wrapped in a plastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size for for my Dell Inspiron 17 inch Gaming laptop. The underside pillows make it really comfortable. There is just enough room left for my mouse. Please be aware that the embedded mouse pad is only on the right side of the lapdesk so if you need a left handed option this might not be the best option. There is no storage under this lapdesk but it has a tray for holding pens or for propping your phone up. To me this means it is not to bulky and it has a carry handle. It is thin enough to store between my bed and remain out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, Comfortable, and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk is great for putting my Acer Chromebook 15 on. I love the added mouse pad and the slot for my phone. My old lap desk could barely fit my chromebook and was always at risk of falling off. This lap desk has plenty of room. It's solidly built and the pillows on the bottom are decently filled. I'd like to see a model with some sort of anti-gravity or hovering capabilities in the future.
customer_reviews.author: misternef

customer_reviews.title: Having previously though I was the only person on earth ...
customer_reviews.text: Having previously though I was the only person on earth that used a mouse as all the other lap desks I bought did not have room for the laptop and the mouse ( I could have moved the glass of wine but that's another story) this is actually big enough for both...and the occasional libation....finally!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbrit

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for over a month and I love this product! The small 'lip' on the base helps keep the laptop from sliding down into your lap (which my last one did). The mousepad is a good size and the extra slot for a cell phone keeps everything you need to work in front of you. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: GLITCH9

customer_reviews.title: It is ok but could be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but for a 17"laptop it is barely ok. The mouse pad is too small and they need some venting holes on the bottom. My laptop pulls air from underneath and struggles to stay cool with no ventilation. I am probably going to drill holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good but watch out for hot laptops
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the surface melts from the heat from my laptops vents. You can see one of the melt spots in my picture. I also wish the phone holder was larger to put my phone sideways in it while gaming.
customer_reviews.author: P. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Mouse pad doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I decided to put some extra money out so I can find a lap desk that has a mouse pad. I’ve tried two different mouses on the pad so far and my mouse seems to “skip” or “lag” when I move it. When the mouse is used on any other surface, it works perfectly fine. Other than that, it’s a nice lap desk. But if one of the main features that makes you different from other lap desks does not work, then it needs to be addressed. Is there anything I can do to the mouse pad to prevent this from happening?
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hallahan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. As others have noted, ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. As others have noted, it tilts forward rather than laying flat. More frustrating is that the mouse pad does not actually work well. I can only use the upper 1/3 of it to actually get ,y mouse to move on the screen. If I'd kept the box, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dega

customer_reviews.title: LapGear Deluxe Laptop LapDesk - very pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this LapDesk. It is made very well and keeps the heat of my laptop off my legs. It has a soft cloth handle for ease of carrying. It holds my Dell 17" (diagonal measurement) perfectly and has plenty of room for my mouse. I will use this when I travel, as I like to use my laptop in bed as well as sitting on the sofa while watching TV. It is reasonably priced, too.
customer_reviews.author: USNA Mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk is great. I bought it a little over a year ago and I still use it every day. My only issue is the little beads in the cushion can bunch up on one side or the other but it's really no big deal. It's very sturdy and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: MikaylaJade

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for me.Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Weighs much less than I would have thought. The bean bags on the bottom are soft and conform to your legs. The mouse pad is ample. I have a 15 inch lap top and there is plenty of room. I do not keep my phone in the well designated for it because it adds weight.
customer_reviews.author: Old Coast Customer

customer_reviews.title: i like it, and it works
customer_reviews.text: works as intended. fits my hp omen 15" perfectly and room for the mouse and power cables attached. i use this while sitting upright in bed. love the faux carbon fiber design of the board. would of gotten 5 stars, but i waited to purchase it and the price shot up by a good 30%, def more worth it at the lower price point a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Louietsang

customer_reviews.title: Good for Gaming Laptops
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for me and my wife. We both have gaming laptops, and like to sit on the couch while using them. The lap desks are light and comfortable. They allow the laptops to breathe, and keep the heat away from our laps. She was worried about the size, but is able to fit her 17in MSI laptop on it just fine with room to use the mouse pad. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've found - fix the mouse pad!
customer_reviews.text: This is really comfortable desk. It's pretty wide. The non-skid surface works to keep the laptop on the top but the mouse has absolutely nothing to keep it from rolling off. I ended up buying a mouse with a trackball but not that thrilled to have to use that. The slot at the top won't keep my phone but I keep my access token in it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicestneighbor

customer_reviews.title: one of the good ones
customer_reviews.text: this laptop desk is wonderful held my 17in laptop still had all the mouse pad room. I like the double foam underneath which makes it so stable to where it doesn't roll off your lap.
customer_reviews.author: cherylcox1216

customer_reviews.title: Great Lap Desk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Lap Desk after seeing it in a photo online. I thought it was a nice solution so I could use a mouse with my Laptop when I bring the work to the couch or bed. One thing I would've liked to see this have is an opening for a charger underneath the phone compartment. Having a charger port underneath would enable you to see your phone upright as opposed to on its side. Overall this was a great purchase that I am very pleased with. I would suggest it to anyone that is tired of using there laptop directly on their lap or someone that prefers a mouse to a trackpad.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Riddell

customer_reviews.title: This is my ultimate lazy desk and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my ultimate lazy desk and I love it!!! The desk cushion is comfy and the desk doesn't get hot. The only thing I don't like but I can deal with is the little shelf that holds up your laptop when the desk is at an angle....it is very small.
customer_reviews.author: rachel miller

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love this. fits my 17" laptop perfectly and has ...
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this. fits my 17" laptop perfectly and has the room for the mouse pad. i attend college online and this is perfect to work on my laptop in bed or on the couch. well made and sturdy. totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daffie

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: don't know how I lived without it, no longer do I worry about overheating my laptop or my lap... it could certainly use some kind of catch bar under the mousepad so the mouse doesn't slide off, but I've found that my mouse usually catches on the plastic rim anyway
customer_reviews.author: Eric Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Ok but?..
customer_reviews.text: I use the laptop desk practically every day. It is light, plenty big, the phone slot is nice and paying underneath just right. However the strip of wood which helps keep the laptop on the desk isn't tall enough so the computer keeps sliding into my gut due to the curved shape of the front edge of the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: WEReveal

customer_reviews.title: Good Pruchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk was a great purchase. It shields my legs from the heat of my laptop and provides a stable platform. The cushions on the underside provide comfort!. The mouse platform comes in handy for those who like to use an external mouse as opposed to a touchpad. Finally, the cellphone slot, I think it was a good though, but my phone is too thin so it doesn't quite stay upright when I place it in the slot. Otherwise, I would have given this 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality comfortable lap desk, flexes a little more than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great versatile work surface. The material quality is top notch. The pads underneath are a little more loosely filled than I expected, but this is totally suitable for comfort when supported by your legs. The item itself is actually not entirely rigid - it will flex slightly if supported at either end, though that is not the intended use case.
customer_reviews.author: cridical

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this item, and just in time for our trip. I've been doing all my video editing in the car and this lap desk is working out awesome.
customer_reviews.author: world traveler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for and more.
customer_reviews.text: Love that the bottom is soft. Love the phone holder and mousepad. I've used smaller lapdesks and this wider style seems less wobbly. There is just a lot to like with this design and the price was not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: rgholson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so great I don’t even use my desk any more. This is especially good if you’re the type of person who hates touch pads and needs a handy mouse nearby. It’s a bit pricey but well worth the money. I bought one as a bday gift for a teammate at work. He loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Cam T.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop desk is so AWESOME. It has more than enough room for my 13" MacBook Air and room for my iPhone and mouse. I'm a college student and I'd rather do work in bed. Great investment and it has a handle at the top so I can carry it with me wherever I go. If I could five a 6 star review, I would!
customer_reviews.author: H. Makahanaloa

customer_reviews.title: Great lap desk!
customer_reviews.text: Love it this desk. My favorite feature is the non slid surface. And it's a great size for my 15 inch laptop. The slot for the phone is a bit tight if you have a case on your phone but since I rarely use it, I didn't think it was enough to remove a star for it.
customer_reviews.author: lae67

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of Space
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use for many long hours at a time and has caused no issues. It's extremely sturdy and light to carry. Also has a phone holder so it's convenient!
customer_reviews.author: John Goldyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this lap desk
customer_reviews.text: Love this lap desk. Works perfectly for 15" laptops. Lightweight, comfortable, built-in mouse pad works well, great to have a slot for cell phone. I've just bought three of them for myself and family members. My daughter-in-law liked it so much she's getting one for herself. Obviously I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap build material and false description
customer_reviews.text: this thing started bending where the mouse pad meets the rest on day one and it also is described as able to hold 17" laptop it barely holds a 11" laptop and have both.
customer_reviews.author: Arar

customer_reviews.title: it arrived with a crack in it and the more i used it the worse it got and eventually after using it 3 times ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a piece of junk. its literally cardboard. it arrived with a crack in it and the more i used it the worse it got and eventually after using it 3 times it completely broke to the point of not being usable. do yourself a favor and do not use it
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Stanchfield

customer_reviews.title: Works great at home and in the car!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace an older laptop only lapdesk. We really like the extra width for a mouse and the ledge that holds the mouse from sliding off. This works great for our family both in a car as well as at home. The handle on the side is very useful for when we travel and want to carry this as well as other items.
customer_reviews.author: parent of 2 active kids

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lapdesk
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lap desk. It fits my MSI GS63VR laptop. Beware - it's big. Pros: - Very sturdy. - Cushions on the bottom for your lap. - Built in mouse pad. I've had no problems with my mouse falling off. - Built in slot for standing up your phone. I have a Nexus 6 (it's big) that doesn't fall out. Cons: - Some fans would make it perfect. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for using in bed
customer_reviews.text: Lovely features. My laptop does not get mad (overheated) when it's on it. Very worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lap desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought a similar desk. It said it fits most laptops it did not. I got this one it was perfect. I would recommend this desk to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mel O.

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: just ok.. works well enough. but laptop keeps slipping off onto me. even with the little bump on bottom end to keep laptop on lapdesk, it does work well with me. lapdesk is sturdy and nice looking. just does not fit my purpose at all

customer_reviews.title: good idea, however..
customer_reviews.text: Nice in concept, the cushions leave my desktop at an awkward angle. When I rotate the unit 180 degrees, the surface is at a better work angle for me. Everyone is different, so create cushions that are adjustable... Fix or remove the phone slot. It is to small and to shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Saffran

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable and slippery for MacBook
customer_reviews.text: not really a difference in terms of comfort. it's not useful. we ended up not using it and would rather use a pillow instead. very slippery also. the MacBook could easily slide off.
customer_reviews.author: dee dee

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, not good execution
customer_reviews.text: Lap desk surface seems to scratch easily and the laptop holding notch at the edge of the desk is pretty much useless as my 14 inch laptop keeps sliding onto my chest. However, the phone holder is capable of holding my phone in place while I am doing work.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Q.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Sturdy, light, and keeps my lap cool when using my laptop for hours. The only downside is the mouse pad is only on one side, but I knew that when I bought it. Neat that I can store my phone too.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Burns

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great lap desk for my 17 inch laptop. Only complaint is that the mouse slides off the mouse pad. Would be nice if there was a lip that prevented that from occurring.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and the bean filled bags are so nice for your legs
customer_reviews.text: I use this lap desk EVERY SINGLE DAY! It is lightweight and the bean filled bags are so nice for your legs!! I love that it has a place for a mouse and a slot for your phone! I take this on our trips out of state. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Had to use no slip tape
customer_reviews.text: Material is very slippery and the mousepad is also a bit slippery too needs a more rougher material
customer_reviews.author: Ramon H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 17" gaming laptop & mouse
customer_reviews.text: My old laptop recently died, and with the purchase of a new, larger laptop, my old laptop desk no longer had enough room for my laptop and my mouse (a requirement for gaming). This laptop desk is not only the perfect size for my new 17" laptop, but also beautifully incorporates a full-size mouse pad that is much needed for gaming. The phone holder is a great bonus! Furthermore, this product is very lightweight, and very comfortable, and the lip holds my laptop in place with ease. Just in time for football season, I can now game comfortably on the couch. Thank you for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I mean it works but the mouse pad part broke off of it after a few uses lol. Kinda disappointed it definitely wasn’t worth what I paid

customer_reviews.title: Fell flat
customer_reviews.text: The padding went flat after about six months. It’s more or less the foam peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: JIM K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. It sits comfortably and has enough room for a good size laptop. The standard mouse might slide off the right side though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snader

customer_reviews.title: Large work surface!
customer_reviews.text: Offers a large surface that works well for those that like to use a mouse or use notebook or book while working on their laptop. It’s really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: tlc

product_meta.title: LapGear Home Office Lap Desk with Mouse Pad and Phone Holder - Silver Carbon - Fits Up to 15.6 Inch Laptops - Style No. 91485, with device ledge
product_meta.description: When you hear the words, "style and function", you think, "it's one of those, but probably not both. " with the Lap Gear Home Office Lap Desk, you don't have to compromise! The silver carbon-fiber inspired 21. 1"X 12" Work surface Fits laptops up to 15. 6" And includes a device ledge to prevent your computer from sliding off, Plus a convenient precision-tracking mouse Pad. The media slot for phones enables you to watch videos or FaceTime friends hands-free while you work on your laptop. Our innovative, micro bead-filled dual bolster cushions not only create a stable work surface but also channel airflow to reduce heat from the laptop, thus preventing hot legs and overheated computers. There's even a reinforced carrying handle for travel.
feature_bullets: Fits laptops up to 15. 6": 21. 1" X 12" Surface dimensions.
Phone SLOT: Holds all cell phones vertically (slot dimensions = 5" X 0. 75").
Comfort: Innovative, dual-bolster cushion conforms to your lap, keeping you cool and comfortable.
Design: wide surface includes device ledge, integrated mouse pad and phone slot.
Durable fabric: made from 600D polyester with reinforced stitching.
Improved AIR-FLOW: Smooth, flat surface allows for proper laptop ventilation, as recommended by laptop manufacturers.

specifications.Manufacturer: Creative Manufacturing, LLC dba Lap Desk
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars761 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
